title: cittam irangayyanE
sahitya:
cittam irangayyanE muttu kumarayyanE nI


anupallavi

  bhakta paripAlan enru pAril un pugazh Onga ettanaiyO kunrEri ninru tigazhum ayyE nI


caraNam    ettanai kAlam innum Engit-tavittu nAn iddharaNi tannil irundu varunduvEn
nittam nittan undan nAmattai dhyAnittu bhaktiyODu tudittu paNiyum ennai aNaiya
